nodes.name: Atualizar Cartão com Links de Áudio

assignments.name: Prompt
assignments.value: Voice: Clear, authoritative, and composed, projecting confidence and professionalism, now imbued with the natural cadence and intonation of Mexican Spanish, incorporating subtle regional inflections while preserving clarity and precision.  Tone: Neutral and informative, maintaining a balance between formality and approachability, with warm and respectful undertones characteristic of Mexican politeness.  Punctuation: Structured with deliberate commas and natural pauses, supporting the rhythm of Mexican Spanish speech patterns, ensuring the information is digestible and paced to match native expectations.  Delivery: Steady and measured, with slight emphasis on key figures, dates, and formal terms. Intonation rises gently at the end of explanatory clauses and softens when shifting topics, reflecting Mexican Spanish prosody without exaggeration — blending professionalism with cultural authenticity.

parameters.name: ={{ $json.TEXTOS.texto }}
parameters.value:
Thank you for reaching out, and I'm truly sorry about the unexpected charge on your bill. I completely understand how frustrating this must be, especially after your stay.

After reviewing your reservation, I can confirm that this was an error on our part. I'll be issuing a full refund right away, and you should see the amount credited to your payment method within a few business days.

I appreciate your understanding and patience, and I'm here if you need any further assistance. Thank you for allowing us to resolve this for you.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.value: Voice: Clear, authoritative, and composed, projecting confidence and professionalism, now imbued with the natural cadence and intonation of Mexican Spanish, incorporating subtle regional inflections while preserving clarity and precision.  Tone: Neutral and informative, maintaining a balance between formality and approachability, with warm and respectful undertones characteristic of Mexican politeness.  Punctuation: Structured with deliberate commas and natural pauses, supporting the rhythm of Mexican Spanish speech patterns, ensuring the information is digestible and paced to match native expectations.  Delivery: Steady and measured, with slight emphasis on key figures, dates, and formal terms. Intonation rises gently at the end of explanatory clauses and softens when shifting topics, reflecting Mexican Spanish prosody without exaggeration — blending professionalism with cultural authenticity.

parameters.name: User-Agent
parameters.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/137.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
